page.title: 02 HOUSING
page.content: More houses in our block have two people living in them than any other number of people and there are more houses and cottages than any other kind of house in this area.Altogether there are{51 houses and cottages}but including all the other houses it comes to{59.}More houses are detached than semi-detached or terraced.There are{25 detached 17 semi-detached}and {17 terraced.}Most houses are{41 years old or older because Bitterley and Bedlam are old villages.The oldest house we know about is in Bitterley it is over{400 years old.}More poeple use solid fuel than any other kind of heating because most of the houses are in the{countryside}and{gas}cannot get to them and{electricity}is more costly than the other{fuels.
